note.p: Birth: Knock, County Dublin, Ireland (26 March 1729)
Death: Kilkenny, County Kilkenny, Ireland (01 December 1805)
Burial: St Canice Cathedral, Kilkenny, County Kilkenny, Ireland
Education: Trinity College, Dublin (1742). Graduated BA (1747), MA (1750) and DD (1762)
Career: Professor of Natural Philosophy, Dublin (1759-1764); Bishop of Clonfert and Kilmacduagh (1796-1799); Bishop of Ossory (1799-1805)
